TITLE: Guest Lecture
DEF: Inviting outside experts to share knowledge, experience, and insights
TASK: The Guest Lectures pattern supports assists in bringing in external experts to share their knowledge and insights with students. The GUEST pattern aims to provide fresh perspectives and extend students' understanding while offering networking opportunities. To enhance its effectiveness, ensure the lecture's content relevance, format suitability, and facilitate stimulating post-lecture discussions. The challenge lies in coordinating the content, time, and expectations between the host and the guest speaker.
